backdrop: <rect stroke="white" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" width="100%" height="100%" fill="#color#" />
cover text: #title oval##portrait oval##portrait oval 2##cover title 1##cover title 2##cover author#
cover title 1: #cover title 1 curve#<text style="font: bold 60px serif" width="300" fill="black" ><textPath method="stretch" startOffset="12%" alignment-baseline="top" xlink:href="\#line1Curve">#line1.capitalizeAll#</textpath></text>
cover title 2: #cover title 2 curve#<text style="font: bold 60px serif" width="300" fill="black" ><textPath method="stretch"  startOffset="12%" alignment-baseline="bottom" xlink:href="\#line2Curve">#line2.capitalizeAll#</textpath></text>
cover author: #cover author curve#<text x="170" style="font: bold 30px serif" fill="black"><textPath method="stretch" textLength="25%" startOffset="-15%" alignment-baseline="top" xlink:href="\#authorCurve">by #author#</textpath></text>
title oval: <ellipse cx="50%" cy="600" rx="190" ry="190" fill="lemonchiffon" fill-opacity=".98"/>
portrait oval: <ellipse cx="200" cy="590" rx="50" ry="60" fill="lemonchiffon" fill-opacity=".90"/>
portrait oval 2: <ellipse cx="620" cy="590" rx="50" ry="60" fill="lemonchiffon" fill-opacity=".90"/>
